participant_1.name: Eleanor
participant_1.personality: Eleanor is curious and loves to share her knowledge with others. She enjoys meeting new people and discovering different cultures.
participant_1.background: i'm 60years old. i've visited spain a times. i am a librarian. i think i will retire in a few years. i really like to travel.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Mark is compassionate and has a strong sense of duty. He is dedicated to helping others and enjoys working with animals.
participant_2.background: i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. my favorite color is navy blue. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month. i'm ex military. i work fulltime in a shipyard.
